articles.title: Gordon Singer reflects on Elliott’s ownership of AC Milan: “We are proud”
articles.summary: Gordon Singer commented on Elliott Management’s official exit from AC Milan yesterday, stating that they are ‘proud’ of what they have achieved.  It was back in the summer of 2018 that Elliott took control of the club, as the Chinese owner Yongong Li defaulted on his loan.
